oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Business - One Hundred Oaks Shopping Center
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One Hundred Oaks Shopping Center, Nashville's first enclosed mall, was under construction when this sign advertised space for lease. Harveys, Penneys and Woolco department stores were already under contract. 3 x 4 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: One Hundred Oaks Shopping Center
Business; Popular culture; Shopping
Nashville (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
